brief.content-text:
The diagram depicts an activity in which you must decide whether the characteristics listed below are applicable to RIP v1, RIP v2, or both.

One. Automatic route summarization.
Two. No authentication.
Three. Hop-count metric.
Four. Default 30 second update interval.
Five. Administrative distance of 120.
Six. Supports VLSM.
Seven. Sends subnet mask in routing updates.
Eight. Uses route poisoning, poison reverse, split horizon, and holddowns to avoid loops.
Nine. Broadcast updates.
